I really enjoy this game! I did not expect to like it as much as I did, as a player who can join with friends/family and even random players, its still a great experience! Sometimes, the wait times can be long but its worth it. Its a game you never get bored of, and you can really see your progress and growth overtime. AMAZING GAME! GET IT WHILE YOU CAN! OR YOU WILL BE DEAD BY THE DAYLIGHT.

I pissed myself playing this game

This game is simply wonderful. I have had this game for only about 3 to 4 weeks and already have pumped 106 hours into this game. When I first bought it, I had doubts. I had seen the gameplay and it had seemed simple, repetitive. I thought there was going to be little replayability, and I would gradually lose interest. BOY WAS I WRONG. Although the game is relatively straightforward, the different killers and survivors and their various perks make the game a strategic masterpiece. You can make a build to suit your playstyle by getting teachable perks from different killers/survivors. And although most killers and survivors are behind the DLC paywall, you can still acquire their perks in game using Iredencent shards (earned when you level up just by playing the game). So although you could argue the game is "pay-to-win" in the sense you can essentially buy perks from the steam store, the free perks are MONSTEROUSLY good (depending on the survivor/killer ofc). Enough about the perks though, you probably want to hear about why the game is fun. Well, if you got a group of friends, you can play as survivors and run around repairing generators all while avoiding the killer. Bringing about some terrifying moments when you round a corner and all of a sudden you see the red glare of the killer. But say you don't have any friends, say you are a lone wolf who prefers to hunt rather than run. Well you can fufill those primal urges playing the killer. You can outsmart the survivors, being sneaky and cunning, or you can be a force of reckoning. Running down the survivors making them fear your arrival. Whether you play killer or survivors, there is an experience to be had. My last note for this game is that the community is absolutely wonderful. Although you still get those toxics every once in a while, for the most part everyone is friendly. Rather than getting mad that a killer has "OP" perks or that an ability is "broken", people attempt to adapt and work around it. The killers also sometimes may decide to be nice once in a while and drop you at the hatch and let you escape. In all, everyone is here just to have a good time! I hope this review helped you make a decision whether to pick up this game. Just know that there are plenty of moments both fun and scary that await you!

Bon jeu dans son genre : atmosphère stressante, le concept est intéressant, les tueurs sont assez beaux dans leurs design, système de classement qui pousse à l'amélioration.

Cependant il y a encore beaucoup de bugs, il y a également beaucoup de contenu payant (tueurs/survivants/skins).

Finalement, le but étant toujours le même, ce jeu peu paraître assez répétitif pour certains et un jeu dans lequel on peut tirer pas mal d'heures pour d'autres.
